cjk_all: Sounds like silence : John Cage - 4'33" - silence today - 1912, 1952, 2012 / Dieter Daniels, Inke Arns (eds.).
280 p. : ill., facsims., music, map ; 33 cm. + 1 booklet (xx p. ; 33 cm.)
Published on the occasion of the exhibition "Sounds like Silence, John Cage / 4'33" / Silence Today, 1912, 1952, 2012", held at Hartware MedienKunstVerein (HMKV), August 25, 2012-January 6, 2013.
Includes a critical edition of Cage's notations (Silence Scores).
Text in English with German translation of essays by Dieter Daniels and Inke Arns in accompanying booklet.
Cage, John Criticism and interpretation Exhibitions.
